title: Threesomes: Two Men, One Woman
description: Two Men, One Woman is a selection of erotic sex short stories involving three sexual partners; two males and one female. Many people fantasize about having a threesome, but may not indulge in real life. These erotica stories are perfect to bring those fantasies to life.What's For some people 3 is a crowd, but not for the liberated characters in this erotic romance box set.Scroll up the page and click the big bright yellow BUY NOW button and download your copy today!
author: Darren G. Burton
